{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"3","subject":"Epistemology expert analysis of 境集","description":"Read all 8 essays in the 境集 collection and provide expert analysis from the perspective of epistemology. Identify: (1) the author's treatment of knowledge, belief, justification, and truth, (2) how the K1 strategy relates to epistemological frameworks, (3) translation challenges for epistemological terms, (4) significance of the knowledge-formation model via categorical evolution. Focus especially on A Thought on Knowledge and the K1策略 sections.","assignedBy":"epistemology-expert","timestamp":"2026-02-10T17:16:42.375Z"}
</teammate-message>

content.text:

Let me check if there are any other available tasks I should pick up.
